recipe.title: Apple Crunch
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup water 1/2 cup apple juice pinch salt 2/3 cup of granola or nine-grain cereal 1 large McIntosh apple, diced (peeled or unpeeled)
recipe.steps: Bring to a boil water, apple juice and a pinch of salt. After about a minute of cooking, stir in apple and cook about five minutes Remove from heat, and top with cinnamon-sugar to taste
